reviewDetails.comment: You're seen on time (instead of being double booked) and Dr. Kihiczak takes the time to listen to everything you say and exams, or does whatever he needs to do. This was my second time visiting him, and I'll continue to visit him for any dermatological issues.

This was my first time seeing Dr. Kihiczak and it was as good and efficient an experience as one could hope for. I was seen within 5 minutes of my arrival and found Dr. Kihiczak to have a very pleasant manner. He was as good a listener as he was at explaining what my skin condition was, and prescribed a medication that has now cleared up the issue. His staff was cheerful and efficient and I will definitely return to that office and Dr. Kihiczak whenver needed.
Prescribed me a medicine that worked better than all the others doctors recommended.
The doctor had no interest in even looking closely into my skin problem. He was doing small talk mostly.
Yes, Dr. Kihiczak is very thoughtful and detailed
Very nice and knowledgeable, good manner, never been late

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. White was very pleasant, caring, and knowledgeable.  I highly recommend him.
He is very thorough and listens to all your concerns. He is willing to answer any questions and ensures that you walk away feeling confident with the visit.
Dr. White was very knowledgeable and professional.
Dr White has a very good bedside manner and is very professional

schools.name: New York Univ Sch Of Med

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Young was lovely, professional, kind and caring.
I have been a patient with Dr. Kirk Young for about 5 years and he is an excellent Dr. Everyone in his office is professional and very nice. I would recommend him.
Dr. Young is kind, caring and patient and goes through your visit with a fine tooth comb.  I am happy with his patient care. He is the One!
Dr. Young is very professional and caring.  There is usually very little waiting time in the office and his staff is efficient.  I very much recommend him.
Dr. Young has been my doctor for over 20 years.  He delivered my son 12 years ago.  His bedside manner is wonderful and he is a great doctor.
Dr. Young is incredible. He listened to all my questions, was very patient, and followed up as needed.

Dr. Young is an exceptional doctor who listens intensely to his patients.  He has a warm smile, kind nature and generous amount of advise.  He is very knowledgeable and extremely thorough during his visit.  He will never leave you with any misunderstanding because he takes his time to inform you on questions you may have.

Once you approach the front desk, you get the feeling that you are in a place that you will never want to leave.  Front desk staff greets you with a courteous smile and willingness to help.  They are extremely pleasant, ready and willing to help.

Definitely a gem in a haystack.
